params._from: Account where funds are sent from

approve(address,uint256).details: An approved account can use transferFrom to transfer funds on behalf of the token owner

The current timestamp from the EVM context

params._collectorAddress: Address receiving the the global fee on revenue

params._elFeeRecipientAddress: Address that receives the execution layer fees
params._globalFee: Amount retained when the ETH balance increases and sent to the collector
params._oracleAddress: The address of the Oracle contract
params._withdrawalCredentials: Credentials to use for every validator deposit

params._epochsPerFrame: The amounts of epochs in a frame
params._epochsToAssumedFinality: The number of epochs before an epoch is considered final on-chain

proposeAdmin(address).details: This security prevents setting an invalid address as an admin. The pendingadmin has to claim its ownership of the contract, and prove that the newaddress is able to perform regular transactions.

BalanceTooLow().notice: Balance too low to perform operation

InvalidPublicKeyCount().notice: The received count of public keys to deposit is invalid

InvalidSignatureCount().notice: The received count of signatures to deposit is invalid

InvalidWithdrawalCredentials().notice: The withdrawal credentials value is null

NoAvailableValidatorKeys().notice: The internal key retrieval returned no keys

NotEnoughFunds().notice: Not enough funds to deposit one validator

SliceOutOfBounds().notice: The slice is outside of the initial bytes bounds

TotalValidatorBalanceDecreaseOutOfBound(.notice: The balance decrease is higher than the maximum allowed by the lower bound

TotalValidatorBalanceIncreaseOutOfBound(.notice: The balance increase is higher than the maximum allowed by the upper bound

Unauthorized(address).notice: The operator is unauthorized for the caller

ZeroMintedShares().notice: The computed amount of shares to mint is 0

allowance(address,address).notice: Retrieve the allowance value for a spender

approve(address,uint256).notice: Approves an account for future spendings

balanceOf(address).notice: Retrieve the balance of an account

balanceOfUnderlying(address).notice: Retrieve the underlying asset balance of an account

deposit().notice: Explicit deposit method to mint on msg.sender

depositAndTransfer(address).notice: Explicit deposit method to mint on msg.sender and transfer to _recipient

depositToConsensusLayer(uint256).notice: Deposits current balance to the Consensus Layer by batches of 32 ETH

getBalanceToDeposit().notice: Returns the amount of ETH not yet committed for deposit

getBalanceToRedeem().notice: Retrieve the current balance to redeem

getCLValidatorCount().notice: Get CL validator count (the amount of validator reported by the oracles)

getCommittedBalance().notice: Returns the amount of ETH committed for deposit

getCurrentEpochId().notice: Retrieve the current epoch id based on block timestamp

getDailyCommittableLimits().notice: Retrieve the configured daily committable limits

getDepositedValidatorCount().notice: Get the deposited validator count (the count of deposits made by the contract)

getELFeeRecipient().notice: Retrieve the execution layer fee recipient

getFrameFirstEpochId(uint256).notice: Retrieve the first epoch id of the frame of the provided epoch id

getLastCompletedEpochId().notice: Retrieve the last completed epoch id

getLastConsensusLayerReport().notice: Retrieve the last consensus layer report

getMetadataURI().notice: Retrieve the metadata uri string value

getPendingAdmin().notice: Retrieve the current pending admin address

initRiverV1_1(address,uint64,uint64,uint.notice: Initialized version 1.1 of the River System

isValidEpoch(uint256).notice: Verifies if the provided epoch is valid

proposeAdmin(address).notice: Proposes a new address as admin

requestRedeem(uint256,address).notice: Performs a redeem request on the redeem manager

sendCLFunds().notice: Input for consensus layer funds, containing both exit and skimming

sendELFees().notice: Input for execution layer fee earnings

setMetadataURI(string).notice: Sets the metadata uri string value

totalUnderlyingSupply().notice: Retrieve the total underlying asset supply

transferFrom(address,address,uint256).notice: Performs a transfer between two recipients

underlyingBalanceFromShares(uint256).notice: Retrieve the underlying asset balance from an amount of shares

userdoc.notice: This contract merges all the manager contracts and implements all the virtual methods stitching all components together
